name: Project: V
description:
Rushed Game presents PROJECT: V, a run n gun game that only consists of one player, a battle between the aliens and the mayor of the city. In order to bring back the peace, the mayor will fight the aliens who are trying to destroy the city. It's an action/adventure game in which the main character is a mayor who wants to save the city from an alien invasion. The game has three terrain, with the final terrain requiring the player to face the most powerful enemy's boss. In every terrain, there are also another 3 stages with a boss on every last stage. The player will begin by playing on the Land terrain, which is the easiest level, then move on to the Water or Sea terrain, and finally to the Sky terrain. We decided to leave the game's ending open-ended. It will be as if there will be a sequel with different and more powerful aliens.

Use ARROW KEYS and WASD to Move the Vehicle.

For AIR TERRAIN, Use LEFT SHIFT to Boost the Vehicle.

Use LEFT CTRL to Fire.

Use "R" or the Restart Button to restart the level.

*Notes*

If the player dies on a bullet, you press "R" or the Restart Button to restart the level.

Only one life between the player and the enemies, make sure that you can dodge the enemies as well as their bullets. There might some bugs and glitches on the game and the game also updates after a certain time. 

It is made by the students of Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Valenzuela.  An action/adventure game in which the main character is a mayor who wants to save the city from an alien invasion.  This is for educational purposes.  Hoping for your support in our game!
